member.name: T:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.Server.ChangeTrackingType
member.summary: Defines the type of change tracking that the server database uses.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.Server.ChangeTrackingType.CoupledChangeTracking
member.summary: The server database uses a custom change tracking system.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.Server.ChangeTrackingType.SqlServerChangeTracking
member.summary: The server database uses the change tracking feature in SQL Server 2008.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.Server.DbServerSyncProvider
member.summary: Abstracts a generic server synchronization provider that communicates with the server database and shields the synchronization agent from the specific implementation of the database.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Occurs after a row fails to be applied at the server.

member.summary: Applies inserts, updates, and deletes for a synchronization group to the server database.
member.returns: A object that contains synchronization data and metadata.
member.param: A object that contains metadata about the synchronization group.
A object that contains the changes to be applied to the server database for each table in the synchronization group.
A object that contains synchronization session variables, such as the ID of the client that is synchronizing.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Synchronization.Data.Server.DbServerSyncProvider.ApplyingChanges
member.summary: Occurs before changes are applied at the server for a synchronization group.
